column5: Contrary to rumours, and any bad odors around here, I'ma still alive and a kicking. Past 2 years have been a whirlwind of activity. Nary a day to catch one's breath.  Was nice to see a few familiar faces on Sunday in Peterborough.
Keeping busy is the key Bruce. Getting out fishing once in awhile is also a good thing.  Take care of yourself.
I still don't know how to take care of myself
